doc.field: MINE SAFETY APPLIANCES [MNES] TO SELL UNIT

- Mine Safety Appliances Co said it agreed to sell its filter products division to Donaldson Co Inc [DCI] for undisclosed terms. It said the filter products unit will be relocated from its plant in Pennsylvania to a Donaldson facility in Illinois. It said it expects a number of the unit's 100 employees will be offered positions with Donaldson.
